ITTIA DB IoT C API Reference  8.4.1
Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 Cdb_alloc_tStandard allocator for API data structures
 Cdb_api_statistics_tCount ITTIA DB C API handles opened by the application to measure resource usage and prevent leaks
 Cdb_auth_info_tAuthorization credentials for a password-protected or encrypted database
 Cdb_backup_tOnline backup settings
 Cdb_bind_tRow binding description
 Cdb_blob_tBLOB access data type
 Cdb_buf_stat_tStatistics on a specific page in the database or buffer in the cache
 Cdb_bufmgr_stat_tStatistics on internal buffers
 Cdb_config_tITTIA DB library configuration
 Cdb_crypt_tEncryption hook interface
 Cdb_date_tDate data type
 Cdb_datetime_tDate and time data type
 Cdb_done_tExtended library decommissioning parameters
 Cdb_event_tData change notification event
 Cdb_fielddef_tField definition
 Cdb_file_info_tThe db_file_info_t struct describes information about a database file storage
 Cdb_file_storage_config_tDatabase file storage configuration
 Cdb_file_storage_stat_t
 Cdb_indexdef_tIndex definition
 Cdb_indexfield_tIndex field definition
 Cdb_init_tExtended library initialization parameters
 Cdb_largeint_tLarge integer (64-bit) data type
 Cdb_lm_statistics_tLock manager statistics
 Cdb_mem_statistics_tStatistics for memory allocation with the built-in allocator
 Cdb_memory_config_tConfiguration for built-in memory allocator
 Cdb_memory_segment_tMemory segment for general allocation
 Cdb_memory_storage_config_tDatabase memory storage configuration
 Cdb_odbc_date_tODBC-compatible date structure
 Cdb_odbc_day_second_interval_tDay-time interval data
 Cdb_odbc_interval_tODBC-compatible interval structure
 Cdb_odbc_time_tODBC-compatible time structure
 Cdb_odbc_timestamp_tODBC-compatible timestamp structure
 Cdb_odbc_year_month_interval_tYear-month interval data
 Cdb_oid_tDatabase object identity
 Cdb_seqdef_tSequence definition
 Cdb_statitem_tMeasured statistics item
 Cdb_storage_config_tGeneral storage configuration
 Cdb_table_cursor_tTable cursor settings
 Cdb_tabledef_tTable definition
 Cdb_time_tTime data type
 Cdb_timestamp_tTimestamp data type
 Cdb_ulargeint_tUnsigned large integer (64-bit) data type
 CErrorInfoError information
 Clm_config_tLock manager configuration
 Clm_local_config_tLock manager configuration for local lock manager
